00016 #include "b3AlignedAllocator.h"
00017 
00018 int b3g_numAlignedAllocs = 0;
00019 int b3g_numAlignedFree = 0;
00020 int b3g_totalBytesAlignedAllocs = 0;//detect memory leaks
00021 
00022 static void *b3AllocDefault(size_t size)
00023 {
00024         return malloc(size);
00025 }
00026 
00027 static void b3FreeDefault(void *ptr)
00028 {
00029         free(ptr);
00030 }
00031 
00032 static b3AllocFunc* b3s_allocFunc = b3AllocDefault;
00033 static b3FreeFunc* b3s_freeFunc = b3FreeDefault;
00034 
00035 
00036 
00037 #if defined (B3_HAS_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR)
00038 #include <malloc.h>
00039 static void *b3AlignedAllocDefault(size_t size, int alignment)
00040 {
00041         return _aligned_malloc(size, (size_t)alignment);
00042 }
00043 
00044 static void b3AlignedFreeDefault(void *ptr)
00045 {
00046         _aligned_free(ptr);
00047 }
00048 #elif defined(__CELLOS_LV2__)
00049 #include <stdlib.h>
00050 
00051 static inline void *b3AlignedAllocDefault(size_t size, int alignment)
00052 {
00053         return memalign(alignment, size);
00054 }
00055 
00056 static inline void b3AlignedFreeDefault(void *ptr)
00057 {
00058         free(ptr);
00059 }
00060 #else
00061 
00062 
00063 
00064 
00065 
00066 static inline void *b3AlignedAllocDefault(size_t size, int alignment)
00067 {
00068   void *ret;
00069   char *real;
00070   real = (char *)b3s_allocFunc(size + sizeof(void *) + (alignment-1));
00071   if (real) {
00072         ret = b3AlignPointer(real + sizeof(void *),alignment);
00073     *((void **)(ret)-1) = (void *)(real);
00074   } else {
00075     ret = (void *)(real);
00076   }
00077   return (ret);
00078 }
00079 
00080 static inline void b3AlignedFreeDefault(void *ptr)
00081 {
00082   void* real;
00083 
00084   if (ptr) {
00085     real = *((void **)(ptr)-1);
00086     b3s_freeFunc(real);
00087   }
00088 }
00089 #endif
00090 
00091 
00092 static b3AlignedAllocFunc* b3s_alignedAllocFunc = b3AlignedAllocDefault;
00093 static b3AlignedFreeFunc* b3s_alignedFreeFunc = b3AlignedFreeDefault;
00094 
00095 void b3AlignedAllocSetCustomAligned(b3AlignedAllocFunc *allocFunc, b3AlignedFreeFunc *freeFunc)
00096 {
00097   b3s_alignedAllocFunc = allocFunc ? allocFunc : b3AlignedAllocDefault;
00098   b3s_alignedFreeFunc = freeFunc ? freeFunc : b3AlignedFreeDefault;
00099 }
00100 
00101 void b3AlignedAllocSetCustom(b3AllocFunc *allocFunc, b3FreeFunc *freeFunc)
00102 {
00103   b3s_allocFunc = allocFunc ? allocFunc : b3AllocDefault;
00104   b3s_freeFunc = freeFunc ? freeFunc : b3FreeDefault;
00105 }

00107 #ifdef B3_DEBUG_MEMORY_ALLOCATIONS
00108 //this generic allocator provides the total allocated number of bytes
00109 #include <stdio.h>
00110 
00111 void*   b3AlignedAllocInternal  (size_t size, int alignment,int line,char* filename)
00112 {
00113  void *ret;
00114  char *real;
00115 
00116  b3g_totalBytesAlignedAllocs += size;
00117  b3g_numAlignedAllocs++;
00118 
00119  
00120  real = (char *)b3s_allocFunc(size + 2*sizeof(void *) + (alignment-1));
00121  if (real) {
00122    ret = (void*) b3AlignPointer(real + 2*sizeof(void *), alignment);
00123    *((void **)(ret)-1) = (void *)(real);
00124        *((int*)(ret)-2) = size;
00125 
00126  } else {
00127    ret = (void *)(real);//??
00128  }
00129 
00130  b3Printf("allocation#%d at address %x, from %s,line %d, size %d\n",b3g_numAlignedAllocs,real, filename,line,size);
00131 
00132  int* ptr = (int*)ret;
00133  *ptr = 12;
00134  return (ret);
00135 }
00136 
00137 void    b3AlignedFreeInternal   (void* ptr,int line,char* filename)
00138 {
00139 
00140  void* real;
00141  b3g_numAlignedFree++;
00142 
00143  if (ptr) {
00144    real = *((void **)(ptr)-1);
00145        int size = *((int*)(ptr)-2);
00146        b3g_totalBytesAlignedAllocs -= size;
00147 
00148            b3Printf("free #%d at address %x, from %s,line %d, size %d\n",b3g_numAlignedFree,real, filename,line,size);
00149 
00150    b3s_freeFunc(real);
00151  } else
00152  {
00153          b3Printf("NULL ptr\n");
00154  }
00155 }
00156 
00157 #else //B3_DEBUG_MEMORY_ALLOCATIONS
00158 
00159 void*   b3AlignedAllocInternal  (size_t size, int alignment)
00160 {
00161         b3g_numAlignedAllocs++;
00162         void* ptr;
00163         ptr = b3s_alignedAllocFunc(size, alignment);
00164 //      b3Printf("b3AlignedAllocInternal %d, %x\n",size,ptr);
00165         return ptr;
00166 }
00167 
00168 void    b3AlignedFreeInternal   (void* ptr)
00169 {
00170         if (!ptr)
00171         {
00172                 return;
00173         }
00174 
00175         b3g_numAlignedFree++;
00176 //      b3Printf("b3AlignedFreeInternal %x\n",ptr);
00177         b3s_alignedFreeFunc(ptr);
00178 }
00179 
00180 #endif //B3_DEBUG_MEMORY_ALLOCATIONS
